statements: SELECT * FROM PropertyListings;
SELECT property_address, property_price, property_bedrooms FROM PropertyListings WHERE property_size > 2000;
SELECT listing_id, property_type, property_bedrooms, property_bathrooms FROM PropertyListings WHERE property_size BETWEEN 1000 AND 1500;
SELECT listing_id, property_address, property_price FROM PropertyListings WHERE property_bedrooms >= 3 ORDER BY property_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM PropertyListings WHERE property_type = 'Apartment' AND property_size < 1500;
SELECT listing_id, property_address, property_price FROM PropertyListings WHERE property_type = 'House' ORDER BY property_price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM PropertyListings WHERE property_bedrooms >= 3 AND property_bathrooms >= 2 ORDER BY listing_id ASC;
SELECT property_address, property_size, property_type FROM PropertyListings WHERE property_size > 2000 AND property_type IN ('Apartment', 'Condo') ORDER BY property_size DESC, property_type ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT alert_criteria FROM PropertyListings WHERE property_address LIKE '%New York%' OR property_address LIKE '%Los Angeles%';
SELECT listing_id, property_address, property_bedrooms, property_bathrooms FROM PropertyListings WHERE property_bedrooms = 4 AND property_bathrooms = 3 ORDER BY listing_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM property_listings WHERE property_id = 1;
SELECT property_type, location, price FROM property_listings WHERE price > 100000;
SELECT * FROM property_listings ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT property_id, property_type FROM property_listings WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM email_alerts WHERE last_sent > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM property_listings ORDER BY price DESC, property_type ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT property_id, location, price FROM property_listings WHERE property_type='House' OR property_type='Apartment'
SELECT * FROM property_listings WHERE location LIKE 'New%'
SELECT property_id, property_type, location, price FROM property_listings ORDER BY property_type DESC
SELECT MAX(price) AS max_price, MIN(price) AS min_price FROM property_listings
SELECT * FROM PropertyListings;
SELECT property_name, price, location FROM PropertyListings WHERE property_type='House';
SELECT property_name, location, price FROM PropertyListings WHERE price >= 50000;
SELECT * FROM PropertyListings ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT property_name, location, price FROM PropertyListings WHERE location='New York' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM PropertyListings WHERE price > 100000 ORDER BY property_name ASC;
SELECT property_name, location, price FROM PropertyListings WHERE property_type = 'House' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT property_name, property_type, location FROM PropertyListings WHERE price < 50000 AND location LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY property_name ASC, price DESC;

SELECT criteria_name, property_type, location, max_price FROM Criteria INNER JOIN PropertyListings ON Criteria.property_type = PropertyListings.property_type AND Criteria.location = PropertyListings.location ORDER BY criteria_name ASC;

SELECT EmailAlerts.alert_id, EmailAlerts.email_address, Criteria.criteria_name FROM EmailAlerts INNER JOIN Criteria ON EmailAlerts.criteria_id = Criteria.criteria_id WHERE Criteria.max_price < 200000;
SELECT * FROM property_listings;
SELECT property_name, price, location FROM property_listings WHERE bedrooms >= 3;
SELECT property_type, price FROM property_listings WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM user_criteria WHERE max_price < 500000;
SELECT user_id, subscription_date FROM user_subscriptions WHERE active = true;
SELECT * FROM property_listings ORDER BY price DESC, bedrooms ASC;
SELECT property_name, property_type, location FROM property_listings WHERE bedrooms >= 2 AND bathrooms >= 2;
SELECT property_name, price, location FROM property_listings WHERE location = 'New York' AND price BETWEEN 100000 AND 300000;
SELECT id, property_type, bedrooms FROM property_listings WHERE property_type = 'House' AND bedrooms > 4 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT property_name, price, location FROM property_listings WHERE location LIKE '%Beach%' AND price < 500000;
SELECT * FROM property_listings;
SELECT property_name, address, price FROM property_listings WHERE bedrooms >= 3;
SELECT id, property_name, address, price, bedrooms, bathrooms FROM property_listings WHERE price < 500000;
SELECT id, property_name, address, price, bedrooms FROM property_listings ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT id, property_name, bathrooms FROM property_listings WHERE address LIKE '%Ave%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM property_listings ORDER BY price DESC, bedrooms ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT property_name, address, price FROM property_listings WHERE bedrooms >= 3 AND bathrooms >= 2 ORDER BY price ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, min_price, max_price FROM user_preferences WHERE min_bedrooms = 2 AND max_bedrooms = 4 ORDER BY user_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, property_id, criteria FROM property_alerts WHERE criteria LIKE '%close to schools%' ORDER BY user_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT email_id, subject, timestamp FROM email_queue WHERE sent = FALSE ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
